# drape

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Doubly Robust Average Partial Effect estimation.

Details of the method can be found in [Klyne and Shah (2023)](https://arxiv.org/abs/2308.09207).

## Installation

You can install the development version of drape from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("harveyklyne/drape")
```
